name: No Monsters
description:
Disclaimer:
This Game deals with the subject of suicide. Please be warned, when you play this game.
Also the game contains some flashing lights. Please be warned.

This game is made for the Mini Jam 112. The theme of the jam is "chrono" with the limitation to only use 3 inputs. Read more

The Game:
You have to get through the clocktower, to reach the top. But you have to hide from the Monsters, which want to stop you.

Controls:
Movement:
 Left Arrow, A
 Walk Right: Right Arrow, D

Hide/Stairs:
 Spacebar, Arrow Up, W

Gamepad is partially supported.

Developers: svenpl, chilibonbon
